params.planId: The ID of the plan to cancel

params.monthlyCap: Maximum monthly spend limit (must be >= amountPerRun)

returns.planId: The ID of the newly created plan

execute(uint256).details: This function can be called by anyone (bot/keeper) when plan is due For MVP, we: - Check plan is active - Check block.timestamp >= nextRun - Check amountPerRun <= monthlyCap (simple cap logic) - transferFrom owner -> this contract - approve vault - deposit into vault for owner - update nextRun

params.planId: The ID of the plan to execute
The ID of the plan to pause

execute(uint256).notice: Execute a plan - pull USDC and deposit into vault

pausePlan(uint256).notice: Pause an active plan (can be resumed later by adding a resume function in future)

plans(uint256).notice: Mapping from plan ID to Plan struct
